TextBlock.Text: BEGONIA: Why is there an empty warp transmitter here?
PROTEA: This warp transmitter used to lead to <color=orange>Hidden Light</color>, the invisible star orbiting <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>.
PROTEA: <color=orange>Hidden Light</color> orbits along the purple energy ring around <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>.
PROTEA: The warp core from this transmitter was repurposed to power <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>'s <color=orange>Central Core</color>.
